name: BitcoinArbitrageSkill
0:

”What is the current spread”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bitcoin buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des: Calculates the current bitcoin arbitrage from CME and CBOE exchanges,and sends a mail to your amazon account when the arbitrage crosses the set value.
